docs.snippet: Opening another legal attack on the NFL over the long-term health of its athletes, a group of retired players accused the league in a lawsuit Tuesday of cynically supplying them with powerful painkillers and other drugs that kept them in the game ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Opening another legal attack on the NFL over the long-term health of its athletes, a group of retired players accused the league in a lawsuit Tuesday of cynically supplying them with powerful painkillers and other drugs that kept them in the game but led to serious complications later in life.

headline.main: Ex-Players Sue NFL Over Use of Painkillers
headline.print_headline: Ex-Players Sue NFL Over Use of Painkillers
